ygData.subject: Re: tradeskills
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, I have 180+ in Alc tolerance, It IMO is used just for fun, RP, etc... the only classes who would benefit from the str it gives are melee, non-casters.  all
ygData.messageBody:
ok, I have 180+ in Alc tolerance, It IMO is used just for fun, RP, etc...
the only classes who would benefit from the str it gives are melee,
non-casters. all classes will get a str boost, but it will be at the
expensive of not being able to cast.
For us clerics, the only benefit is RPing. It is also not a skill you want
to practice while out hunting, god forbid you are staggering when a party
member needs a heal.
Str don't mean anything for us anyway, so everyone out there who is big on
having alot of str, might as well forget it, we are not Meleeists, never
will be. Agi and dex are even more important than str is.
